topic.title: Please help distribute deepfakes
topic.body:

1518072989_1GgNo3CmxPd7n2pMSF3uyqf1XHvgt.body: Yes please, Deepfakes is a category of it's own!
I saw this from voat fuckkk deepfake is perfect for this

> [scrubthesecond](#comment_82_1GgNo3CmxPd7n2pMSF3uyqf1XHvgtTUqCe): Absolutely! I find it so odd how people move from Reddit to Voat. Both platforms are centralised, so they'll only get taken down again.

yes and honestyl we only need deepfakes to be archived anyway lol il try posting some to porn zeronet channels but it would be great to create a deepfake category but i am new to this i hope i can find out how

> [halex](#comment_7_1EjCZapTECBem63aaBazBrwa9eh9AwmXuq): I have found an initial version of DEEP FAKES: http://127.0.0.1:43110/122Ad6qhGRhFNcGgqSqkg9karrQf4fAPZe

Thank you king!

> [deepfake](#comment_6_1M3M7mVoyXYtWz3aq6BG4fP2fwjdv7Rxj1): Post here http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1FhBo4Yg7R7iMqLhnJJAGiJprwehzkaKuK:deepfakes:0

In here anyone can post deepfakes :)

To everyone please go to Files > Help Distribute All New Files on the following deepfake zerosite:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/122Ad6qhGRhFNcGgqSqkg9karrQf4fAPZe - Archived by someone

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1FhBo4Yg7R7iMqLhnJJAGiJprwehzkaKuK:deepfakes:0 - You can free to post here

To the guy who's keeping the site: http://127.0.0.1:43110/122Ad6qhGRhFNcGgqSqkg9karrQf4fAPZe/

Are you able to create a forum there that allows us to submit? We have awesome # of peers/seeds so i'm thinking we funnel everything to your zite(I created the millchan one) but we need to have a forum or user submission function in your zite that would be the deepfake dream!

> [halex](#comment_7_1EjCZapTECBem63aaBazBrwa9eh9AwmXuq): I have found an initial version of DEEP FAKES: http://127.0.0.1:43110/122Ad6qhGRhFNcGgqSqkg9karrQf4fAPZe

Halex when the apocalypse come (Banning of dpfak.com and /v/deepfake), zeronet will be deepfake's last stand brother.

Update on millchan's board you can now press the [PIN] button to selectively download from the deepfakes and other boards of your choice only. So press that pin button on that deepfakes board

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/

1524102661_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: We all live in shackles my friend and we should all be aiming to cut that off, until then we are just sheeps to the wealthy and powerful

1526895582_12uaobyUhg6H9rh88Ryu1x8xrJWBn.body: It can be if you want to, zeronet is user-curated anyway. Most users here don't really use zeronet for deepweb stuffs though.

1527096825_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: My mom suffers with Bipolarity (triggered by depression) and my friend also have one too, the big difference is my mom accepts and knows she has it so in cases that she have her mood swings she's able to fight it or take her meds without question. My friend unfortunately could not accept it and it makes thing worst. I hope you stay off being depressed and also get a lot of sleep/rest to get your mind off things.

Yup, it is a condition you can definitely live with. People who don't think much of it usually just tells you to "STAY POSITIVE" and other inspirational BS, but I know it's not that simple (honestly those only makes matters worst since my mom gets pressured lol). 

alcohol is definitely a no-no. keeping your mind occupied is a big help. Quite frankly i've been living with mom and her condition all my life and she is normal 90% of the time until she gets depressed or forget to take her sleeping pills from there things gets triggered that leads to anxiety/sleep deprivation/depression.  But here's the important bit, we know what to do to keep her calm (usually she's mostly afraid of doing things that may hurt herself or hurt her so we do stuffs like showing her there's no sharp objects or whatever it is that makes her feel depressed)

That's why It is also super important to tell your loved ones so they'd know what to do to keep you sane, when hallucination happens, they're the ones who will snap you back to reality.

1527351127_19Qid9uyfWCTmx2cUpDboEKCscRd4.body: the decentralization does not make anyone safe, videos saved in zeronet is not encrypted, just do a media search to your computer and you'll see what I mean.
